Phrase: As soon as we entered the Portal, we were reunited with Mary Rosegarden, who had fought and defended this place for us.
She was supposed to be cooperating with the Out-Siders, and at present they were supposed to be allies in the form of collaborators, but suddenly Blackfriar stabbed Mary in the back.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Ggh...

Name: Mary
Phrase: Blackfriar, bastard, you stabbed me with all your might...

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: Oh, you're in more pain than I thought.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: You're not well trained enough if you consider that painful. Should the Out-Siders get a wound like yours, they'll just shrug and walk casually into the Phantom Mist, you know?

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Miss Blackfriar! How could you do such a terrible thing! Stabbing an ally with a sword is an absolutely unforgivable act!

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: Just get the Hell away from her! If you come any closer she'll decapitate you and you'll die!

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Ah...

Name: Mary
Phrase: ...Tsk, they've seen right through me. But I can still kill you in this range!

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Eh?

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: Are you a Monster that shapeshifts into people? Or are you a Monster that deceives with illusions?

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: My guess is the former. Judging from how I impaled you, it's likely that I've impaled your actual body. Of course, there's always exceptions.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: Whatever, your transformation's flawed. My advice to you is to never underestimate humans!

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: It's impossible for me to steal the real Mary Rosegarden's blade. Even less so, that she would allow me any opportunity to stab her.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Tch...

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: The real Mary Rosegarden will never waver her convictions for Queensway's sake. 'Maybe we can be together'? Hah, she's no fool.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Indeed. There's no way she would say something like that...

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: And besides...

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: Even if she had been the real Mary, I won't allow her to ignore me and have a lovely chit-chat with other people without reporting to me directly on why she couldn't contact me on regular intervals, I would have attacked her mercilessly.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: So, farewell♪

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: It's a Monster...

Name: Putra
Phrase: Wow, it looked and sounded exactly like her.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: I didn't notice it at all. ...

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: Be careful moving forward, because sometimes it'll be too late by the time you find out. Queensway would have been killed if I weren't here, you know?

Name: Queensway
Phrase: I would have been killed...?

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: Yes.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Girls, look at that monster's arm!
When I looked at the corpse of the dead Monster, I saw that the right arm that had belonged to Mary earlier had had changed into that of a horrific beast.
...No, it is more accurate to say that the disguise had been dispelled.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: It's sorcery has been broken and it is returning to its original form. It has strong claws and thick arms. Should it attack any one of us, our heads would roll.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: It was within range. If Blackfriar hadn't stopped it, Queensway would have been killed instantly.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: That's how it is. You're still alive, Queensway! The closer you get to the Giant Tree, the more you're going to have to be careful of unknown enemies like the one you faced just now.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: That was close. If it wasn't for Miss Blackfriar...

Name: Queensway
Phrase: We were on alert even before we entered the Portal. I could sense the presence of Phantom Mist, and I could sense terrible magic everywhere.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: But I didn't sense anything from Mary just now. I wasn't caught off guard. I treated her as if she was Mary altogether.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: The more you think about it, the scarier it gets, doesn't it? With every hour that goes by, the fear gets a little bit more intense.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Yes... that's exactly right. How do you know?

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: Because I've been through a lot of it. It's an inevitable part of being an Out-Sider.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: What you felt was the fear of death. Not the fear that you might die. It's the fear of seeing the consequences of being dead.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: Queensway saw the moment of her own death. The only reason you are standing here now is because I 'saved you'.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: The moment you realise that, you are struck with an unspeakable terror.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: And after that you will feel a slight elation. You were terrified just a moment ago. You'll feel so emotional after that you'll almost smile.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: (...She's right)

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: There is no shame in feeling fear. The important thing is to face your fears. Don't turn away from it, accept it as a matter of fact and gain new strength.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: When you can no longer do that, the life of a warrior ends there. Either you have to leave the battlefield, or you die on it.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Queensway, are you alright? Don't worry too much about it.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Yes, I'm okay.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: I've been there myself. So I understand the fear you're feeling right now.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: That was a nasty attack, wasn't it? I knew Mary was here from the start, even I didn't have the slightest reason to be alarmed.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: But Miss Blackfriar noticed. She read between Mary's lines and the way she acted. And from the way she was behaving, she saw that it was a fake.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Yes. You were fooled. But it's not only you. Everyone but Blackfriar was fooled. Even Yoshino, who has good instincts, didn't fully realise it.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: We're not strong enough. Not you, not me, not all the Train Knights here.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Let us all be strong together. 'We will do our best to die for one victory'. Remember what Blackfriar said.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Yes.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Um, Miss Yakutsk...

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Yes?

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Thank you so much. I feel a little better now.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: You're welcome.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: Alright, so we've suddenly stumbled across something really nasty, but most importantly, Mary's nowhere to be found.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: It's hard to imagine her leaving her post without leaving any trace of where she went. So either she was taken away instantly, deprived of her bodily freedom, or

Name: she was teleported somewhere else...
Phrase: 🔔*RING RING RING*

Name: Queensway
Phrase: That sound!

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: No way, not at a time like this...

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: Good grief, give me a break. Every single time these things show up it's never good news.

Name: Samantha
Phrase: I found lost children who went through the Portal. And I found they killed a Mist Monster.

Name: Samantha
Phrase: Do you want to know where Mary Rosegarden went?

Name: Samantha
Phrase: 'I want to know...' Exclaimed the Knights of St. Iris. One is very eager to meet the other; The other is more eager to fulfil her purpose.
Samantha
If you want to know, I will tell you. I'm sure she has what you children want.
